Name: Conflict Of The Universe
About the game: The AI defense systems that has safe guarded the Galactic Alliance for years, has now gone wild! It is up to you and your crew to fight the AI defense systems and take  back  control of the galaxy! This game is fully built around Steam remote play. You and 3 other friends can control a star ship together and fight back enemies that you encounter! Different star ships to control, each having their different movement and weapons, and some will have abilities.  Different missions to play from, following the story mode, or you can pick one at random for more reward! Which you can use to get new starships!  Control a lot of different starships! As you fight for the survival of mankind! Each station has its own feature for controlling the ship, From flying the ship itself, to managing the power of the ship and selecting the targets! Do you have what it takes to save the galaxy? Or will you let it fall into AI control?
